title: JSON Leave a small note on the body just in case your parents find out that you did escape, and make sure that you take your cell phone with you so they can call you.
JSON Instead of just giving a traditional card, write the person a small note or letter.
Just JSON write a message of sympathy to the bereaved, and you can write a small note of a funny time you enjoyed with the deceased.
